bio: "Sometimes, you gotta roll the hard six." -William Adama ""Get rid of all bitterness, rage, and anger, brawling and slander, along with every form of malice. Be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving each other, just as in Christ God forgave you." -Some other crazy homeless criminal  that reminds me how i gotta try harder.....   "Genius demonstrates its autonomy not by ignoring all rules, but by deriving the rules from itself" -Kneller We Can Solve Principal
